quizitems.questiontext: Who is/was The 40th president of the United States?
choices: Barack Obama
Ronald Reagan
Jimmy Carter
John F. Kennedy

quizitems.questiontext: What is the longest river in the world?
choices: The Mississipi river in North America
The Amazon river in South America
The Yangtzee river in Asia
The Nile river in Africa

quizitems.questiontext: What is the smallest park in the United States?
choices: Mill End Park, Portland Oregon
Central Park, New York City
Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial in Philadelphia
The Acton State Historical Site in Acton Texas

quizitems.questiontext: What is the oldest tree in the world
quizitems.answertext: Dennis (Pinus longaeva), White Mtns, CA, USA
choices: Methuselah (Pinus longaeva), Inyo City, CA, USA
CBR26 (Sequoiadendron giganteum), Sierra Nevada CA, USA
Dennis (Pinus longaeva), White Mtns, CA, USA
A nameless Fitzroya cupressoides, Alerce Andino National Park, Chile

quizitems.questiontext: What is the tallest building in the United States?
quizitems.answertext: One World Trade Center, New York City, NY
choices: Trump International Hotel and Tower, Chicago IL
The Wilshire Grand Center, Los Angeles, CA
JP Morgan Chase Tower, Houston, TX
One World Trace Center, New York City, NY
